synopsis.text: Humanity finds itself on the brink of extinction with the sudden emergence of enigmatic entities known as Archons. These powerful creatures pose an unprecedented threat to mankind's existence. In a desperate bid for survival, humans rally their forces around an elite unit known as the Goulart Knights. These exceptional warriors possess the unique ability to manifest the Chalice, a sacred artifact believed to be the source of humanity's power. By harnessing the Chalice's might, the Goulart Knights stand as humanity's last line of defense against the Archons, engaging in a fierce battle to safeguard their world.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
